Title: Build Next-Gen AI Apps with .NET and Azure
Author: dotnet
Description:
Join this session for an exciting journey as we explore the latest and greatest in AI and .NET. In this talk, we'll show you how to build cutting-edge, next-generation AI applications using .NET and Azure. We'll guide you through the end-to-end process, from development to production, revealing the powerful tools and frameworks available for building intelligent applications.

Learn how to harness the power of the cloud to scale your AI workloads and discover how you can bring these AI workloads to your existing applications. Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your skills and knowledge in the world of AI and .NET!

You will learn: About the latest advancements in AI development with .NET Walk away with an overview of samples & templates you can use in your work today. Finally, you'll get a glimpse at what the future holds, to help you build your skills for what's next.
